column4: Is there any way to clear the high scores of the games I play?
fine the file that stores them and delete them?
ls -a will list hidden files, or ctrl-h in nautilus
no need to compile, it's in the repos
is there a reason you don't want to use the xmame in the repositories?
it seems to be in multiverse, have you enabled it?
no, just X should be sufficient
save what you are working on, then press ctrl-alt-backspace
restarting X had no effect; Totem is still giving me the same thing
system > preferences > multimedia selector, what does it say for the video stuff?
I'll be back in a few minutes
